dunit.report

Module to handle reporting.

License

MIT. See LICENSE for full details.

class ResultCollator;

A class to collate unit test information and present a report.

@property bool resultsSuccessful();

Return a boolean representing if the unit tests ran successfully.

Return Value

true if the tests ran successfully, false if not.

void addResult(string moduleName, DUnitAssertError error = null);

Add a result to the collator.

Parameters

string moduleName The module where the error occurred.
DUnitAssertError error The error raised from the toolkit.

DUnitAssertError[string] getResults();

Get the results.

Return Value

An array containing the results.
